pageContent: Purpose: To describe men who agreed to be randomized to the Prostate Cancer Prevention Trial (PCPT), a 7-year, double-blind placebo-controlled study of the efficacy of finasteride in preventing prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Sexual health problems in French cancer survivors 2 years after diagnosis-the national VICAN survey
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26685697/
